name: Papageno
description:
Learn music intervals by ear and make bird friends!

macOS: Requires a Playstation 3 or similar dual-stick controller.

Windows: Coming soon!

This game was made for the Toronto Game Jam (TOJam), May 5th—7th, 2017.

Art: Karla Wong

Sound: Kai Winter

Design and Code: Colin Sanders & Jason RT Bond
